data.name: Princess Daphne - Topless Game
data.detailed_description:
PRESENTATION


PUSH START AND PLAY TOPLESS IMMEDIATELY! IMMEDIATELY!

Add an extra zest of sexiness with this DLC allowing you to play from the start with ALL your characters topless,
including those that don't normally do so in the normal game ♥ ♥

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains nudity as well as kinky comical scenes and situations.
It does not contain depictions of sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, or self-harm.
All characters are over the age of 18.
